TN.content: philosophers, meddlers who can’t keep their hands off anything, insatiable polymorphous perversity, imperious encyclopedism

TN.content: Bergson: all philosophers see one point, a contact more than vision

TN.content: Nancy might add, the point is not a point (indivisible), but the point, punctuality, is divisible, a touchable limit, spacing forever
